item.title: Setting up MunkiReport-PHP on Ubuntu 16 with Nginx
item.description: This post is still really rough, but should be fully functional.

item.title: Faster Munki Downloads from Nginx
item.description: Through multiple issues over the last month or so, I decided to completely rebuild my Munki server. This server is semi-critical in our district as all configurations are now sent out via Munki. As I was waiting for Ubuntu 16 to install and do some base configurations, I started looking for some guides on how to increase performance. I stumbled across worker_cpu_affinity.

item.title: Deploying DetectX Swift with Munki
item.description: DetectX Swift is an alternative to MalwareBytes Anti-Malware and was more economical for our district to use. It also is faster and more what we were looking for. I highly recommend it! This is a write up based on how we are deploying it here.
